nodes.text: First Order High Command, also known as First Order Command, was the military leadership council of the First Order born from Imperial High Command of the Old Empire.[source?] General Armitage Hux was a member of the High Command. Twice a day, the High Command would broadcast recorded speeches, most often from General Hux himself, to their stormtroopers through holoprojectors detailing the deplorable conditions of the New Republic and the First Order's alleged many victories over the Republic.
